name: Dumps On Demand
short_description:
Wikis are an important source of information and knowledge, yet many wikis disappear from the face of the Internet everyday, and the information stored on it gets dragged down along with it, mainly due to the lack of proper backups.

Dumps On Demand, working in hand with the developers at WikiTeam, hopes to break that long-term tradition. We want you, our users to take part in the archiving process simply from your web browser. Tell us your favorite wiki and we will have it saved in minutes, for you to download and for the world to celebrate that yet another piece of important source of knowledge has been preserved, forever.
summary: Archiving public wikis from the web
